question: Who is the present foreign minister of Indonesia?
explanation: Indonesia foreign minister Retno L P Marsudi arrived on 13 December on a two-day visit to India. The Minister will attend key talks on the Indo-Pacific region. She will hold talks with the External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on 13 December. The ministers have been scheduled to attend the sixth Joint Commission Meeting between India and Indonesia at Hyderabad. Marsudi is expected to deliver a keynote address at a combined session of the Indian Ocean Dialogue and the Delhi Dialogue XI. The two Track 1.5 dialogue aims to build an inclusive approach for a cooperative, free, and rules-based Indo-Pacific region. It is hosted by the Ministry of External Affairs. Delhi Dialogue XI will be held from 13-14 December. The theme of the Delhi Dialogue is Advancing Partnership in Indo- Pacific.
